text:
Luffy-san, mencari Boa Hancock?"
Luffy pun sedikit terkejut dan tersadar, "Eh? Tidak aku tidak mencari wanita tempramental itu. Lebih baik dia tidak ada disini, ia terlalu berisik dan angkuh."
"Aku Margaret, kebetulan hari ini sebenarnya Hancock nge-shift, tapi dia bilang ada urusan jadi dia menukar shift nya denganku,"
Dan Luffy hanya ber-oh ria mencoba untuk tidak peduli.
Seperti biasa, Luffy duduk di spot favoritnya, bersandar di bangku kafe dan berkutak-kutik dengan ponselnya.
Luffy tidak biasanya berkutat dengan sosial media. Semua teman-temannya tidak ada yang tahu jika ia memiliki akun twitter. Jadi akun twitter itu hanya digunakan ketika dia sedang ada waktu luang dan Luffy sangat jarang membuat tweet disana.
3
Dia bukan tipe manusia sosial media, pengecualian untuk instagram.
Semua teman-temannya mengetahui akun instagram milik Luffy itu juga karena Luffy dipaksa untuk membuat akun instagram oleh mereka terutama Nami.
trans:
Luffy-san, looking for Boa Hancock?
Luffy was startled and awakened, "Eh? No, I am not looking for that temperamental woman. It's better if she's not here, she is too loud and arrogant."
"I am Margaret, actually today is Hancock's shift, but she said that she has some business to take care of, so she switched her shift with me,"
And Luffy could only say 'oh', trying not to care.
As usual, Luffy sat in his favourite spot, leaned against the chair in the cafe and fiddled with his phone.
Luffy did not usually care about social media. Not all his friends knew that he had a Twitter account. So, his Twitter account was only used when he had spare time and Luffy rarely posted a tweet.
3
He is not a social media type of person, except for Instagram.
All of his friends knew Luffy's Instagram account and that was also because Luffy was forced to make an Instagram account by his friends, especially by Nami.
